Hetu
Ajjhattattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
27.
2811Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  ajjhattā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2812Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—  bahiddhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
